Question & Options:
Which of the following statements are true regarding the film *Kalank* and its cast?
Options:
A. a) Madhuri Dixit played the role of Bahaar Begum in *Kalank*.
B. b) Bahaar Begum is a character in *Kalank*.
C. c) Madhuri Dixit joined the cast of *Kalank* after Sridevi's demise.
D. d) Madhuri Dixit was cast in *Kalank* on 31 May 2018.
Correct Answer: a) Madhuri Dixit played the role of Bahaar Begum in *Kalank*., b) Bahaar Begum is a character in *Kalank*., d) Madhuri Dixit was cast in *Kalank* on 31 May 2018.

Correct Answer: a) Aditya Roy Kapur is part of the cast of Kalank., b) Kalank was conceived by Karan Johar and his father 15 years before its release., c) The film's production design represents Old Delhi Mohalla.

Options:
A. a) Principal photography of Kalank began in Film City, Mumbai.
B. b) Old Delhi mohalla was represented in the production design of Kalank.

D. d) The principal photography started on 18 April 2018.
Correct Answer: a) Principal photography of Kalank began in Film City, Mumbai. and b) Old Delhi mohalla was represented in the production design of Kalank. and d) The principal photography started on 18 April 2018.
